hw4

Class AbstractShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw4.AbstractShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    api.Shape, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IShape, JShape, LShape, OShape, SZShape, TShape

    public abstract class AbstractShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements api.Shape
    Abstract superclass for implementations of the Shape interface.
    Author:
    SMSheets@IAState.edu - Steven Marshall Sheets

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      api.Shape clone()
      Clones the abstract shape.
      void cycle()
      Cycles the blocks within the cells of this shape.
      api.Cell[] getCells()
      Returns a new array of Cell objects representing the blocks in this shape along with their absolute positions.
      void shiftDown()
      Shifts the position of this shape down (increasing the row) by one.
      void shiftLeft()
      Shifts the position of this shape left (decreasing the column) by one.
      void shiftRight()
      Shifts the position of this shape right (increasing the column) by one.
      void transform()
      Transforms each shape counterclockwise.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • cycle

        public void cycle()
        Cycles the blocks within the cells of this shape. Starts at cells[0] up to cells[length - 1], then back to the first cell.
        Specified by:
        cycle in interface api.Shape

      • getCells

        public api.Cell[] getCells()
        Returns a new array of Cell objects representing the blocks in this shape along with their absolute positions.
        Specified by:
        getCells in interface api.Shape
        Returns:
        the cells occupied by this shape

      • shiftDown

        public void shiftDown()
        Shifts the position of this shape down (increasing the row) by one. Used by the user when pressing the "DOWN" arrow, the game inherently (with a timer), and when a row gets filled and everything needs to collapse.
        Specified by:
        shiftDown in interface api.Shape

      • shiftLeft

        public void shiftLeft()
        Shifts the position of this shape left (decreasing the column) by one. Used by the user when pressing the "LEFT" arrow.
        Specified by:
        shiftLeft in interface api.Shape

      • shiftRight

        public void shiftRight()
        Shifts the position of this shape right (increasing the column) by one. Used by the user when pressing the "RIGHT" arrow.
        Specified by:
        shiftRight in interface api.Shape

      • transform

        public void transform()
        Transforms each shape counterclockwise. OTetromino will override this method to do nothing (after all, a circle rotating doesn't appear much different). SZTetromino will override this method to flip across the vertical axis and change the color from GREEN to RED.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface api.Shape

      • clone

        public api.Shape clone()
        Clones the abstract shape.
        Specified by:
        clone in interface api.Shape
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a deep copy of this object
